## Issue Type
- [ ] **Missing documentation** - Something isn't documented
- [ ] **Unclear explanation** - Something is confusing
- [ ] **Broken link** - A link doesn't work
- [ ] **Outdated content** - Information is no longer accurate
- [ ] **Poor organization** - Hard to find information

## Location
**Which document(s) are affected?**

Example: `docs/guides/VALIDATION_FIRST.md` or `QUICK_REFERENCE.md`

## What's Wrong
**Describe the problem clearly**

## Suggested Fix
**How would you fix it?**

Provide specific suggestions if possible. Feel free to include:
- Rewritten text
- Better organization
- Additional examples
- Clarifications
- Links to related docs

## Impact
**Who does this affect?**

- [ ] New users
- [ ] Builders
- [ ] Validators
- [ ] All users
- [ ] Other: ___________

## Effort to Fix
- [ ] Trivial (5 min)
- [ ] Small (15-30 min)
- [ ] Medium (30-60 min)
- [ ] Large (1+ hour)

## Priority
- [ ] Critical (blocking understanding)
- [ ] High (commonly needed)
- [ ] Medium (nice to improve)
- [ ] Low (polish/nice-to-have)

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information
